title: @Riot Can we please have it where smiting an enemy champion grants assists?

replies.body: You must deal damage, apply CC, apply a debuff, or apply a buff in order to get an assist. Chilling Smite deals damage and will grant an assist, Challenging Smite doesn't deal damage unless you AA the target, and while the vision is a debuff, I don't think assists are given for vision debuffs.
Doesn't Challenging Smite also reduce the target's damage dealt to you?  That sounds like a debuff to me (even if they don't actually attack you).

ok thank you for clearing that up.

so I guess since red smite deals no damage it does not count as an assist.
